bio: David Thompson is a celebrated landscape painter inspired by the British countryside and Impressionist masters. His work captures the changing light and seasons with a distinctive palette and loose, expressive brushwork. Based in the Cotswolds, he has gained international acclaim.

media.videoPost: Plein air painting in the Cotswolds countryside. The golden hour light transforms everything into pure poetry. Setting up my easel by the river, capturing the fleeting moments of nature's beauty. #LandscapePainting #PleinAir #BritishCountryside
